description:
The House of Detention is revealed. It's morning and Master Van Darkholme is awoken by slave dante. We discover that Master Tober's been a bad boy; being the guardian for the House's Code of Conduct, Van punishes Master Tyler and Master Nick for Tober's disorderly conduct - he feels that when one gets punished, all should be punished. After good floggings all around, Master Van invites everyone for a morning sex on his bed.
Director's note: This update pays homage to my childhood. I was playing soldiers with my GI Joes and one day decided to play dungeon with them... and it went something like the first and second parts of this update. When Tober Brandt showed up on at the shoot with rainbow hair, my jaw dropped; I flashed back to a childhood moment of sugar-induced rush when I colored the head of my GI Joe with my magic markers.
title: Tober Gang Bang: Part One
